DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate the effect of JTT-705 doses from 300 mg to 900 mg on the elevation of HDL-C and on the inhibition of CETP activity versus placebo, in patients presenting with mild dyslipidaemia. These objectives will be tested after 4 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of JTT-705 300, 600 And 900mg in Comparison With Placebo in Patients With Type II Hyperlipidaemia
DOC.criteria: Patients with of Type II hyperlipidaemia Patients having lipid values as indicated below: HDLC < 1.6 mmol/l TG < 4.5 mmol/l Male and females between 18 and 65 years old (If female must be postmenopausal, or premenopausal and surgically sterile or using an acceptable form of contraception) Body Mass Index (BMI) > 35 kg/mÂ² Pregnant, breast feeding, or woman with child bearing potential without an effective method of contraception Concomitant use of medications identified in the protocol
